resources.string: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
Nothing diminishes anxiety more than action.
In the technology industry, where revolutionary ideas drive the next big growth areas, you need to be a bit uncomfortable to stay relevant.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
In a world where information is abundant and easy to access, the real advantage is knowing where to focus.
Everybody comes to a point in their life when they want to quit, but it\'s what you do at that moment that determines who you are.
Whether you think you can or you think you can\'t, you are right.
Any person capable of angering you becomes your master. They can anger you only when you permit yourself to be disturbed by them.
Employ your time in improving yourself by other menâ€™s writings so that you shall come easily by what others have labored hard for.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
